artist: Artist: Marshall Weber; Designer: Book design and production by Mark Wagner; Printer: Layout and printing by Amy Mees; Publisher: Booklyn Artists Alliance, New York
creditline: Gift of the Print and Drawing Curatorial Council
description: photographic images of collages made from altered yearbook photos and printing; maroon cloth cover with gold metal corners; red slipcase; 28 pp.
provenance: The artist, New York; (Booklyn Artists Alliance, New York); sold to MIA, 2003.
signed: Signed on inside back cover, in black and blue ink: Marshall Weber    Amy Mees    Mark Wagner
title: Souvenir
